DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the superiority of KCT-0809 to placebo, and to evaluate safety in dry eye patients with Sjögren's syndrome
DOC.brief_title: A Phase III Study of KCT-0809 in Dry Eye Patients With Sjögren's Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Dry eye patients with Sjögren's syndrome Corneal and conjunctival damage Severe ophthalmic disorder Punctal plugs or surgery for occlusion of the lacrimal puncta
